channel.title: Dialogue problem
channel.description:
hiii, me and a friend of my try to make a quest
but we got some problems with the dialogues
we got this, where u make a choice: case 565: sendOption2("Ok, I'll help you", "Im far to busy to help a selfish king such as you."); c.dialogueAction = 80; break;
but if u click "ok i'll help you", the dialogue stops can some1 help me with getting the dialogue further??
rep++ who helps me :D

item.title: Dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

so what when the end off part 1 comes up and it says ok i’ll help you ( you click it but the part 2 don’t come up )

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue problem
item.dc:creator: @get_a_life1 get_a_life
item.description:
@get_a_life1 wrote:

hiii,
me and a friend of my try to make a quest

but we got some problems with the dialogues

we got this, where u make a choice:
case 565:
sendOption2(“Ok, I’ll help you”, “Im far to busy to help a selfish king such as you.”);
c.dialogueAction = 80;
break;

but if u click “ok i’ll help you”, the dialogue stops
can some1 help me with getting the dialogue further??

rep++ who helps me

Read full topic
